Return the current output duty-cycle setting, measured as a percentage (float) 83  * 84  *

Note

90  * This value may not match exactly the value set by a previous write(). 91 

Returns:

85  * A floating-point value representing the current duty-cycle being output on the pin, 86  * measured as a percentage. The returned value will lie between 87  * 0.0f (representing on 0%) and 1.0f (representing on 100%). 88  * 89  *
